names.name: Elohim Tzabaoth
names.description: The Divine Name associated with Hod, reflecting the majesty and splendor of God's manifold creation.

names.name: Michael
names.description: The Archangel known for his role as a protector and the leader of the army of God.

names.name: Beni Elohim
names.description: The order of angels associated with Hod, often seen as intermediaries between the divine and humanity, representing intellect and communication.

names.name: Mercury
names.description: The planetary influence associated with Hod, symbolizing communication, intellect, and travel.

names.name: Hod
names.description: Signifies the grandeur and splendor that come from the precise execution of God's will.

names.name: Majesty
names.description: Embodies the glory and awe-inspiring aspect of the divine plan manifesting through order and intellect.
